item.title: CSS and JavaScript aren't byte code !!
item.description: Disclaimer: I was a noob(literally) when I wrote it. I just didn’t wanted to delete it as it was my first blog. The earliest computers were often programmed without the help of a programming language, by writing programs in absolute machine language. The programs, in decimal or binary form (mostly binary),were read in from punched cards or magnetic tape or toggled in on switches on the front panel of the computer.
